prompt_group.name: Generated Graph Test Prompts
prompt_group.description: Auto-generated graph prompts with 3 graphs and 3 questions each

prompts.name: Graph BFS from A
prompts.description: Perform breadth-first search on a directed graph
prompts.content:
You will be given a list of directed edges and an operation to perform.
For BFS, return only the nodes reached at the specified depth (not the starting node).
For parents, return only nodes with edges pointing to the given node (not the node itself).
The graph has the following edges:
A -> B
B -> C
C -> D
Operation:
Perform a BFS from node A with depth 3.

prompts.name: Find parents of A
prompts.description: Find all parent nodes of a given node
prompts.content:
You will be given a list of directed edges and an operation to perform.
For BFS, return only the nodes reached at the specified depth (not the starting node).
For parents, return only nodes with edges pointing to the given node (not the node itself).
The graph has the following edges:
A -> B
B -> C
C -> D
Operation:
Find all parent nodes of A.

prompts.name: Reachable nodes from B
prompts.description: Find all nodes reachable from a given starting node
prompts.content:
You will be given a list of directed edges and an operation to perform.
For reachable, return all nodes that can be reached from the starting node (not the starting node itself).
The graph has the following edges:
A -> B
B -> C
C -> D
Operation:
Find all nodes reachable from B.
